name: Movey Pipe
description:
DISCLAIMER

ALL OF THE CREDIT GOES TO THE CREATOR OF FLAPPY BIRD - DONG NGUYEN

This is a game made for 

Xandee 101 Game Jam

This is a really bad game, and I would not recomend to play this game untill it gets updated. I spent maybe 8 hours on it in total. In the middle of my project, the (transitions or scenes)  stopped loading, but the code was all right, This made me have every single sprite, text, ect... on one seen. The sad thing is, if this would have worked, it would have been a great game. I will try to fix the game as soon as possible, but I'm tired and am going to hit the sacks.  Also, It sometimes just make you lose and you can do nothing about it :C.

Move with Arrow keys....

One more thing is a special thanks to:

Lucas, Landon, Saylah, Andrew, Joey, and Judson for seeming interested in this game before it went down hill reeeeeeealll fast.

:P
